title: At least 1,400 rural phone boxes protected from closing
description: New Ofcom rules will protect boxes in areas of poor mobile coverage or where they are needed for safety.

title: UK will not copy EU demand for common charging cable
description: The EU has provisionally agreed new mobile devices must, by autumn 2024, use the same type of charger.

title: Uber powers emergency food deliveries in Ukraine
description: Uber has built a "private-label" version of its delivery platform to help the UN deliver food and water.
